sub_title: Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT
summary:
I'm a dedicated hard worker. I thrive in new and challenging situations and I like to go the extra mile.

I specialize in resource- and process management and process optimization using data but have a very broad field of interest.

With this broad field of interest, I like to apply my knowledge and experience in a wide variety of functions. 

I like to help people grow and see what we can achieve as a group.

school.name: Aviation Studies at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences

projects.title: Valet Parker at Bank Insinger de Beaufort
projects.description: As Valet Parker at Bank Insinger de Beaufort (Insinger), I coordinate the garage of Insinger. I will either convoy the cars or valet park the cars myself. Besides this I assist facility and the mailroom by checking in/out (parcel) post, setting up or breaking down meeting rooms, event rooms etc.

contributors.headline: Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT

projects.title: Valet Parker/Doorman at the Waldorf Astoria Hotel Amsterdam
projects.description: As a Valet Partker (VP)/Doorman at the Waldorf Astoria I am positioned at the main entrance. My colleagues and my are essentially the face of the hotel, we are the first and last people the guests see as they enter or leave the hotel. My duties are valet parking the guests car, as a provided service we vacuum clean the cars and provide the guests with a bottle of water and peppermints.

contributors.headline: Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT

projects.title: Aviation Professionals 2013 - Operational Team
projects.description: The Aviation Professionals event is an event which houses different conferences. Including the Aviation Knowledge and Career Day (AKCD), Security Seminar and the Aviation Management Conference. The AVProf day 2013 is held at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences on December 14th 2013.

contributors.headline: Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT
Strategy & Project Manager | Supply Chain & Operations | Henkel

projects.title: Cargo Supervisor C.O.T
projects.description: As cargo supervisor (COT) at Singapore Airlines Cargo (SIA) I inspect wether the rules, as established by SIA, are being abided by the handler (being AviaPartner in this case). During a COT shift I inspect the cargo before the airplane arrives at the ramp, during handling I inspect wether the employees of the handler follow SIAs rules and after everything is load aboard, I inspect wether the cargo has been loaded properly and is securely fastened.

contributors.headline: Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT

projects.title: Project Flight Planning
projects.description: During this assignment, a flight plan will be created for a flight from Amsterdam Shiphol International Airport (EHAM) to Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport (PANC) with a Boeing 747-400 ERF. Two malfunctions on the aircraft have to be taken into account while creating the flight plan. The role of Operation Controller is taken on when the flight commences. During this time a volcano will erupt over Anchorage and the operation controllers will have to react and come up with a viable solution.

contributors.headline: Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT

projects.title: Project Powerplant
projects.description: The aim of this project is to make a conceptual design of a gas turbine engine suitable for the propulsion of the Fokker 70. This design must guarantee high operational reliability, meet current environmental requirements and meet the specified performance characteristics.

contributors.headline: Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT

projects.title: Aviation Knowledge and Career Day 2013
projects.description: The Aviation Knowledge and Career Day (AKCD) is a conference for pilots, engineers, air traffic controllers, cabin crews and airliners. It will house speakers from around the world, including the test pilot for Airbus: Capt. Etienne Miche de Malleray, test pilot for Boeing: Capt. Heather Ross and many more.

contributors.headline: Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT
Strategy & Project Manager | Supply Chain & Operations | Henkel

projects.title: Project Landing Gear
projects.description: During this assignment we have made a functional analysis of the landing gear on a modern intercontinental aircraft. We have also made a mechanical analysis of the landing gear calculating critical forcer on the gear following certification laws as described in CS-25.

contributors.headline: Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT

projects.title: Aviation Introdution for Rookies (AIR) 2013
projects.description: Starten met een nieuwe studie kan best eng zijn. Een nieuwe tijd is aangebroken en waarschijnlijk ken je nog niemand op deze grote nieuwe school. Om er voor te zorgen dat jij een goede start maakt en alvast een groot gedeelte van je studie genoten leert kennen organiseren wij het leukste introductiekamp van het HBO. Afgelopen 2 jaar zijn we met ruim 150 man naar de Belgische Ardennen vertrokken om elkaar daar alvast beter te leren kennen. In deze week zijn er veel actieveiten georganiseerd om ervoor te zorgen dat je ook iedereen leert kennen.

Team Leader Airside - Specialised in process optimization & management | CPL(A) - MEP, SEP, IR, Night, A-UPRT

profile_positions.description:
As maintenance controller I am responsible for the technical availability for the fleet of Transavia. This includes homebase and outstation AOG support, workorder management and technical liaison for the OCC and operational duty manager.

In this function I am one of the Part-CAMO responsible persons where I provide efficient and effective management for planned and unplanned maintenance on a 24/7 basis. I am also the first point of contact for flight crew experiencing technical discrepancies and I coordinate between different stakeholders, both internal and external, in AOG situations.
profile_positions.title: Maintenance Controller

profile_positions.description: As Chief Pilot I am responsible for KLM Aeroclub's fleet with regards to safety, operational procedures and communication of flight operation and technical matters.
profile_positions.title: Chief Pilot

profile_positions.description: Continuing on several outcomes of my earlier research into resource management and proces optimization I have started multiple projects to improve Swissport's operation. These projects include, but not limited to, data-mining and data-driven operation, digitizing flight administration and documentation and real time allocation of ground service equipment. This made Swissport Amsterdam the progressive station in resource management and allocation for GSE, compared to her sister stations worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Project lead

profile_positions.description:
As teamlead I am responsible for all airside employees, I make sure all employee are facilitated in their duty's so they can work safe, efficient and conduct their duties optimally. I conduct performance, absence reviews and implement improvement plans when this is not the case. I am also the airside departement's point of contact, I conduct audits and escort external auditors. In case of an incident I conduct a corrective and preventive action research and I maintain a professional and optimal working relationship with our client airlines, their representatives, the airport authority and other internal departments.

Besides my teamleader duties, I make sure Swissport experiences continuous growth and improvement through proces management and optimization within the airside department in collaboration with other departments.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
As Admin Supervisor I am responsible for the correct documentation and administration for Swissport. I categorise and archive all relevant turn around data for the handler. Besides this I check the ground service equipment (GSE) and make sure every team has the correct GSE and tools available for the turn-around. I also make sure all additional resources used during a turn around are correctly submitted to our financial administration.

Additionally I have written the Standard Operating Procedures for this function within Swissport Amsterdam and I have trained the other Adminsup employees.
profile_positions.title: Admin Supervisor (Trainer)

profile_positions.description: As Load Supervisor I am responsible for the aircraft from the moment it taxied onto the gate until it taxied out after pushback. This includes but not limited to docking, unloading/loading and talkout. I was responsible for the correct unloading and loading of luggage, mail and cargo. Besides this I worked together with load controllers in creating loadsheets and loading instructions to load the aircraft according to the most optimized mass&balance. I also made sure the turn around was conducted according to the airline rules and SOPs, as well as that of the airport and IATA. Finally I was the main contact for Flight Crew during the turnaround.
profile_positions.title: Loading Supervisor (Trainer)

profile_positions.description:
As graduate research for Aviation Studies at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences I am conducting a recourse management and proces optimization research for Swissport Amsterdam.

Swissport's operation is analyzed and researched to determine which recourses should be implemented to recover after the COVID pandemic.
Besides this the operation is analyzed in detail so the proces can be optimized.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Research Intern - Recourse Management & Proces Optimization

profile_positions.description:
I drive the ambulance for the HAP (Huisartsenpost / General Practice centre), provide medical assistence and overall help in the practice.

Working ounder high pressure and medically caring for patients is part of my job.
I am also included in diagnosing patients and judging emergency levels.
Besides this I am the main contact point for doctors, patients and their family during house visits. 
A clear and calm communication towards patients is key.
profile_positions.title: Ambulance chauffeur

profile_positions.description:
Voor Viggo, de nieuwste afhandelaar op Schiphol, en haar partner Transavia, ben ik verantwoordelijk voor het trainen van brake operators. Tijdens sleep bewegingen moet het vliegtuig aangezet worden om remdruk te leveren.
Voor Transavia wordt hiervoor een aangepaste versie van de electrical powerup supplementary checklist voor gebruikt. 
In de cockpit van Transavia train ik viggo medewerkers om de B737 correct op te starten, te remmen indien nodig en het correct afsluiten.

Daarnaast ben ik pushback chauffeur voor Viggo. Na een afhandeling, om het vliegtuig in de positie te brengen om veilig en onder eigen kracht de vlucht te starten, voer ik de pushback uit.
profile_positions.title: Brake Operator Trainer - Pushback Driver

profile_positions.description:
Integrated Ab-Initio Flight school. 

ATPL(A) theory and CPL (IR/ME) conducted at both L3 CTS, Portugal and after an ATO transfer at Global Aviation SA, Megara Greece. 
VFR and IFR training conducted on C152, C172, P28A and PA44 Piper Seminole. 

MCC (A320) conducteur Global Aviation SA 
MCC/AJFC (B737) conducted EPST in Utrecht, The Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Student Pilot

profile_positions.description: The Supervisory Board (RvT) plays an advising and supervising role in the SVAAA. If a complaint or a question arrises, the various committees of the association can address the board members, but either the board members or commission members can also address the RvT. Together with the Advisory board (RvA) they form The Council and together they have enough experience to help the association whenever necessary.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description: The 'Studie Vereniging Amsterdam Aviation Association' is an association that dedicates itself to the students studying at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences. The SVAAA organizes activities  like visiting aviation engineering companies and air shows. They also organize conferences as well as gatherings so students can broaden their social network. For the freshmen the SVAAA organizes an introduction camp before the start of their semester.
profile_positions.title: Secretary

profile_positions.description:
Most employees of D&B The Mobility Group are students. These students work here as student driver, valet parker, doorman or parking supervisor for several clients of D&B.

I work fulltime for D&B, working together with multiple clients of D&B. Clients like Waldorf Astoria Hotel, where I provide the valet parking service, Amsterdam ArenA, where I coordinate the entire parking level, Hewlett-Packard, where I provide a shuttle service between Station Amsterdam South and the HP office in Amstelveen South. Finally I am the Assistent Shift Leader at the Valet Parking Service at Amsterdam Schiphol Airport.

Besides that I work at the D&B office providing the morning protocol, within this function I am the one who solves last minute problems in the morning hours. Besides this all I am also hired to provide services like valet parking, parking supervisor, host, at a variety of events.
profile_positions.title: Private Driver/Assistant Shift Leader

profile_positions.description: As Allround Logistics Employee I am operational on all area's. Through Werk&IK I will be working for Aviapartner, Menzies Aviation, Swissport and ServiceAir. I will be working on the ramp and in the hangar for these ground service company's. In the hangar my duty's will be building and shipping pallets and cargo units to be transported by continental and intercontinental cargo- and passenger aircraft. On the ramp my duty's will be: allround ramp employee. During the turnaround of both passenger and cargo aircraft I will handle almost all ground handling equipment. This includes connecting the GPU, setting chocks, placing the safety zone, placing bagage track against the aircraft, placing the stairs against the aircraft, operating high loaders and loading and unloading the bagage from the aircraft.
profile_positions.title: Allround Logistics Employee

profile_positions.description:
Als coördinator van het studentenmentoraat hou ik het contact met alle student-mentoren. Dit zijn studenten uit de hoofdfase die een docent assisteren met de begeleiding van een werkgroep eerstejaars studenten. Dit begeleiden bestaat uit het voeren van gesprekken met de studenten over persoonlijke situaties, studieresultaten, studeren en meer. 

Ik verzorg theorie en praktijklessen voor de mentoren en coördineer interne gesprekken zodat ervaringen gedeeld kunnen worden zodat de mentoren en lering uit kunnen halen.

Dit idee is voortgekomen uit student begeleiding team SLIM en mij is verzocht om het op te zetten.
Dat betekend dat ik het programma moet opzetten met de wensen van SLIM, daarnaast schrijf ik ook de draaiboeken voor mijn functie. Nadat het testjaar is voltooid zullen andere domeinen en opleidingen het programma overnemen. Het toekomstbeeld van deze functie is dat die HvA breed gebruikt zal worden, dit moet ik dan ook meenemen in het schrijven en opzetten van deze functie.
profile_positions.title: Coördinator Student Council
